what.a: EmAI offers Robots as a Service: humanoid robots for rent with a monthly fee including robots, maintenance, updates, and support – without acquisition costs. Our software platform controls everything centrally.

why.a: Humanoid robots work in existing environments without modification, use existing tools, and can be flexibly deployed. They offer maximum flexibility with minimal adaptation of existing processes.

cost.q: How does the cost model work?
cost.a: You pay a monthly fee based on number and scope of robot deployment. Included are: robots, maintenance, software updates, technical support, insurance, and training. Terms are individually tailored.

timeline.a: After needs analysis, we create an individual plan. Deployment typically occurs within 2-4 weeks – from planning through installation to training.

jobs.a: Robots fill gaps created by labor shortages. They take over repetitive or physically demanding tasks and enable employees to focus on more qualified activities.

target.q: Which organizations is EmAI suitable for?
target.a: EmAI targets companies and public sector organizations in three areas: manufacturing, logistics, and warehousing. The service model is particularly suitable for organizations wanting to automate without capital investment.

technology.a: We deploy the latest generation of humanoid robots developed for human collaboration. Our software coordinates deployment, monitors performance, and continuously optimizes operations.

support.a: The service includes: needs analysis, installation, employee training, ongoing maintenance, technical support, updates, and optimization. You have a dedicated contact person.
